ratings.comment: Dr. Prendergast is an amazing professor, she's very knowledgeable in philosophy plus she is kind to all of the students. I LOVED the lectures, all of the topics were so interesting. The only thing I was disappointed about was that I did the lengthly readings before every class and like half the class never read and still got the same grade as me:(

I just saw that Emma got a page on this website, so this review is from Spring of 2020. Emma is an engaging, stellar teacher. Don't sign up for her class just to skip it, the lectures are worth it! Her lectures are probably the only lectures that have held my attention at UW, and at the time of this post, I'm a junior!

I absolutely loved having Emma this past semester! You can tell that she really cares about her students and their understanding of the material. The course load is very do-able and all of it actually enhances your learning. There were never too many readings and they were always very interesting as well.

I really enjoyed my time in 241. The lecture videos were very high quality and interesting, and never dragged on to long. The readings for the class were very enjoyable as well, and I never felt that there was to much homework.

Emma is actually the best professor I have had at UW. She is so understanding and kind as well as a great lecturer. The material is pretty easy to understand and follow, and I have learned so much. If you have to take this class - wait until Emma is teaching it! It is an easy class but really valuable and informative.
Emma works hard for her students, gives amazing feedback and really is interested in the growth of her students. Very interesting course and a very wonderful professor.

Advice for the course: 1) Complete Asynchronous discussion posts by carefully following the prompts (posts account for 30% of grade). 2) Meet with TA and Emma to polish midterm (10% of grade) and final essay (30% of grade). 3) The writing assignments (15%), syllabus quiz (5%), and participation (10%) are easy points.
Very enjoyable course. Emma made the online format bearable and easy to follow and I felt like I learned a lot. If you do the readings you'll be fine.
Very easy class in my opinion and I actually learned a ton. I loved Emma's style of lecturing and her canvas layout was awesome and easy to keep up with. I would definitely recommend this class.
